mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAL_BOARD_TBL VALUES(SEQ_C_BOARD_NO.NEXTVAL, #{cBoardTitle}, #{cBoardContent}, #{cBoardFileName}, #{cBoardFileRename}, #{cBoardFilePath}, #{cBoardFileLength}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, 'testuser01', 20)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CHAL_BOARD_TBL WHERE C_BOARD_NO IN (SELECT C_BOARD_NO FROM CHAL_LIKE_TBL WHERE USER_ID = #{ userId })
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CHAL_BOARD_TBL CB LEFT JOIN USER_TBL U ON CB.C_BOARD_WRITER = U.USER_ID WHERE U.USER_ID = #{userId }
SELECT DISTINCT COUNT(*) FROM CHAL_BOARD_TBL CB INNER JOIN CHAL_TBL C ON CB.CHAL_NO = C.CHAL_NO WHERE C.CHAL_USER_ID = 'admin' AND CB.C_BOARD_WRITER = #{userId }
SELECT DISTINCT COUNT(*) FROM CHAL_BOARD_TBL CB INNER JOIN CHAL_TBL C ON CB.CHAL_NO = C.CHAL_NO WHERE C.CHAL_USER_ID != 'admin' AND CB.C_BOARD_WRITER = #{userId }
SELECT DISTINCT COUNT(*) FROM CHAL_BOARD_TBL CB INNER JOIN CHAL_TBL C ON CB.CHAL_NO = C.CHAL_NO WHERE C.CHAL_USER_ID = 'admin' AND CB.C_BOARD_WRITER = #{userId } AND C.CHAL_FINISH = 'Y'
SELECT DISTINCT EXTRACT(YEAR FROM C_BOARD_DATE) AS year, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM C_BOARD_DATE) AS month, EXTRACT(DAY FROM C_BOARD_DATE) AS day FROM CHAL_BOARD_TBL WHERE C_BOARD_WRITER = #{userId }
